timeline.message:
update javadoc-samples

@suztomo For some reason not all of these are autoupdating. If you know why, we could fix this at the root.

timeline.bodyText: Do you want to provide some command (find or grep?) here so that executors (you and me in mind) perform the same operations?
timeline.author: suztomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,6 +32,7 @@ version in these documents:
 * https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-opensource-java/wiki/The-Google-Cloud-Platform-Libraries-BOM
 * https://github.com/googleapis/google-http-java-client/blob/master/docs/setup.md
 * https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-java/blob/master/TROUBLESHOOTING.md
+* All pom.xml files in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples

replies.bodyText: Do we have to wait for the auto-update performed before manually editing the page?
replies.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText:
These two bullet points list actions. The first three are URL of the document. Would remove "Merge ..." from the list?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Merge the dependabot PR that updates libraries-bom in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/pulls
          
          
            
            * Manually edit and update any pom.xml files in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples that dependabot missed
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            On the next day, merge the dependabot PR that updates libraries-bom in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/pulls.
          
          
            
            Then manually edit and update any pom.xml files in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples that dependabot missed
timeline.author: suztomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,6 +32,8 @@ version in these documents:
 * https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-opensource-java/wiki/The-Google-Cloud-Platform-Libraries-BOM
 * https://github.com/googleapis/google-http-java-client/blob/master/docs/setup.md
 * https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-java/blob/master/TROUBLESHOOTING.md
+* Merge the dependabot PR that updates libraries-bom in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/pulls
+* Manually edit and update any pom.xml files in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples that dependabot missed

replies.bodyText: Can you add find . -name pom.xml |xargs grep -A 1 '<artifactId>libraries-bom'?
replies.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: No, that's not how I did it or would want to do it.
replies.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: How do you want to do it?
replies.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: I used Github search but that's a choice for whoever's releasing. find works too if you prefer that. No need to specify it here.
replies.author: elharo
